metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27775 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in ImageMagick in MagickCore/quantum.h. An attacker whosubmits a crafted file that is processed by ImageMagick could triggerundefined behavior in the form of values outside the range of type unsignedchar. This would most likely lead to an impact to application availability,but could potentially cause other problems related to undefined behavior.This flaw affects ImageMagick versions prior to 7.0.9-0.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
